question: Who has been appointed as the new Information and Broadcasting Secretary?
explanation: Ravi Mittal has been appointed as the new Information and Broadcasting Secretary. He will replace Mr. Amit Khare who has been appointed as the new secretary of the Department of Higher Education. The appointment was approved by the Appointments Committee of Union Cabinet (ACC). Ravi Mittal belongs to a 1986 batch of Bihar Cadre of Indian Administrative Service. He is currently serving as the Special Secretary in the Department of Financial Services, Ministry of Finance.
